name: Texas Hold'em
rl: 2 private cards, 5 communal. Betting rounds: Pre-flop, Flop, Turn, River.
win: Best 5-card hand or last player remaining after others fold.

name: Blackjack
rl: Hit or stand to get closest to 21 without going over. Dealer must hit on 16, stand on 17.
win: Higher hand than dealer without exceeding 21.

name: BS / Cheat
rl: Discard ranks in order (A, 2, 3...). You can lie. If caught, take the pile. If caller wrong, they take.
win: First player to empty their hand.

name: Hearts
rl: Avoid taking Hearts and Qâ™ . 'Shoot the Moon' by taking all points to hit others with 26.
win: Lowest score when someone reaches 100 points.

name: Spades
rl: Bidding game. Partners predict how many tricks they'll win. Spades are always trump.

name: Crazy Eights
rl: Match suit or rank of top card. 8s are wild and can change suit.
win: First player to empty their hand.

name: Go Fish
rl: Ask players for specific ranks. If they have none, 'Go Fish'. Collect sets of 4.
win: Most sets of 4 at the end of the game.

name: Klondike
rl: The classic. Build foundations by suit A-K. Build tableau in alternating colors down K-A.

name: War
rl: Flip cards. Higher rank takes both. Equals trigger 'War' (3 down, 1 up, high wins all).

name: Gin Rummy
rl: Form sets (3+ of a kind) and runs (3+ in suit). Draw and discard to minimize 'deadwood'.
win: First to reach 100 points across multiple hands.
